[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1683956060361{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;background-image: url(https://hindi-gyan.com/aditya/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Eres-Home2022.jpg?id=8113) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

Fresh Bookings- Best Terms and Service

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1682632683852{background-color: #792923 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Aditya Estates | Best Property Dealer in Noida | Help line Number : +91 9319988572″ font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1684146953012{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Fresh Bookings- Best Terms and Service” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]

Aditya Estates is a RERA-registered firm with a core competency in fresh booking or primary sale of properties. Prior to associating with any builder, Aditya Estates conducts an evaluation at their own parameters to ensure customer satisfaction remains their top priority. Aditya Estates is proudly associated with major real estate developers and builders such as Godrej Properties, Bhutani, Max Realty, LandT Realty, M3M, Gaur, DLF, Omaxe, Eldeco, ATS Infrastructure, Homecrafts, Mahagun, Gulshan, Paramount Builders, Saya Homes, Paras Builtech, ACE, Prateek Buildwell, TATA Homes, Civitech, Elite Builder, ABA Corp, and others.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Aditya Estates not only offers the best deals and services in fresh booking but is also an expert in the resale of properties from the aforementioned builders and developers, whether they are under construction or ready to move. Aditya Estates is committed to providing the best resale price for every seller. With their expertise in the industry, Aditya Estates ensures that the resale process is hassle-free and that both buyers and sellers are satisfied with the outcome.

Overall, Aditya Estates is a trustworthy and reliable partner for anyone looking to buy or sell properties in the real estate market. With their RERA registration and focus on customer satisfaction, clients can be assured of a professional and efficient experience.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Your Requirement- Our Responsibility” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23792923″]

    Resale- Best Deals

    Aditya Estates is an expert in both fresh bookings and resales of properties from major real estate developers and builders. The firm provides a wide range of services related to the resale of properties,

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7643″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/personalised-services/”]
    Personalised Services

    At Aditya Estates, the team is committed to providing aggressive marketing and personalized services to help clients find their ideal home or workplace that caters to their specific needs and preferences.

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7627″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/rent-or-leasing-services/”]
    Rent or Leasing Services

    Aditya Estates offers an extensive database of properties for rent or lease that caters to a variety of requirements, including residential flats or independent houses, commercial office spaces or shops,

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”box1″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7662″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://adityaestates.com/complete-property-solutions/”]
    Complete Property Solutions

    Aditya Estates not only specializes in the sale and purchase of properties, but it also provides a variety of services related to properties. These services include legal assistance for any property disputes,
